attributes.action: Request the resignation of Kay Burley
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: after kay burleys treatment of peter andre in their interview in feb 2010 i would like to see her resign in shame, peter andre went on the show to promote his new album and ms burley took advantage of his vulnerable position involving his ex wife and their children in an opportunistic way for cheap journalistic purposes, i find her insensitive and unproffessional and given how important the delivery of 24hr news is i believe her position has become untenable.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
